well done man
i just had this urge to get down with some old school and you had the shit alright 
thanks
coolest! did u get the other stuff 2 like the lyrics? or jus didnt care 4 it?

Thanks. I can remember as if it were yesterday my childhood friend showing me how to play "What if" off this album on the guitar, he died from cancer one year after this and this song is one that reminds me much of him
